products.name: Engine Components

about.title: COMPANY PROFILE
about.intro: Emof Teknoloji was established in 2008 by Gökhan Emrah OFLAZ under the name Emof Metal. Starting its operations with telecommunication projects, the company has expanded since 2015 to manufacture sheet metal and machined parts for the aviation sector, as well as carrying cases with special damping mounts for military projects.
about.body: In 2017, the company rebranded from Emof Metal to Emof Teknoloji. It provides design, production, and assembly services tailored to the needs of various sectors. In 2019, the manufacturing of pipe construction assembly parts for the retail sector was added to its portfolio.
